trans-unit.source: Sets the identity of the user for an ASP.NET application when forms authentication is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Define a identidade do utilizador para uma aplicação ASP.NET quando a autenticação de formulários está ativada.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The FormsAuthenticationModule sets the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to an <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object that represents the user identity for the current request when the authentication <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode> in the [authentication Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/27bc0ba9-f23a-45f3-ae42-dbe7916e3ee2) element of the application's configuration file.
trans-unit.target: O FormsAuthenticationModule define atual <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade para um <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>objeto que representa a identidade do utilizador para o atual pedido quando a autenticação <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A>está definido como <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode>no [autenticação elemento (esquema de definições do ASP.NET)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/27bc0ba9-f23a-45f3-ae42-dbe7916e3ee2) elemento do ficheiro de configuração da aplicação.</xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A> </xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The FormsAuthenticationModule exposes an <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event that enables you to provide a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object for the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.
trans-unit.target: O FormsAuthenticationModule expõe um <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>evento que permite-lhe fornecer um <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>objeto para a <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>propriedade atual <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> </xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> de personalizado</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event is accessed by specifying a subroutine named **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>eventos são acedidos especificando um subroutine denominado **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** no ficheiro global. asax para a sua aplicação ASP.NET.</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In IIS 7.0, using the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> with the FormsAuthenticationModule is not supported.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > No IIS 7.0, utilizando o <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>com o FormsAuthenticationModule não é suportada.</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: For more information about compatibility issues in Integrated modes, see [Moving an ASP.NET Application from IIS 6.0 to IIS 7.0](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre problemas de compatibilidade nos modos integrados, consulte [mover uma aplicação ASP.NET do IIS 6.0 para IIS 7.0](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: This constructor is not intended to be called from application code.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor não se destina a ser chamado a partir do código da aplicação.

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET calls this constructor to create an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> class.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET chama este construtor para criar uma instância de <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>classe.</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: After calling the constructor, it calls the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Init%2A> method to initialize the new <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> object.
trans-unit.target: Depois de chamar o construtor, aquele invoca o <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Init%2A>método ao inicializar o novo <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>objeto.</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Init%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the application authenticates the current request.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando a aplicação autentica o pedido atual.

trans-unit.source: The Authenticate event is raised during the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> event.
trans-unit.target: O evento de autenticar é gerado durante o <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest>eventos.</xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest>

trans-unit.source: You can handle the Authenticate event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> class by specifying a subroutine named **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: Pode processar o evento de autenticar do <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>classe, especificando um subroutine denominado **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** no ficheiro global. asax para a sua aplicação ASP.NET.</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs><xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property supplied to the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar o <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs> <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>propriedade fornecido para o **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** eventos para definir o <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>propriedade atual <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>para personalizadas <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>objeto.</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property during the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event, the identity supplied by the forms authentication ticket in the cookie or URL is used.
trans-unit.target: Se não especificar um valor para o <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>propriedade durante o **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** evento, a identidade fornecida pelos bilhetes de autenticação de formulários no cookie ou URL é utilizado.</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: The **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is only raised when the authentication mode is set to <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode> in the [authentication Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/27bc0ba9-f23a-45f3-ae42-dbe7916e3ee2) element of the application's configuration file and the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> is an active HTTP module for the application.
trans-unit.target: O **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** evento apenas é gerado quando o modo de autenticação está definido como <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode>no [autenticação elemento (esquema de definições do ASP.NET)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/27bc0ba9-f23a-45f3-ae42-dbe7916e3ee2) elemento do ficheiro de configuração da aplicação e o <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>é um módulo HTTP ativo para a aplicação.</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources, other than memory, used by the <xref href="System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Versões de todos os recursos que não sejam de memória, utilizada pelo <xref href="System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is not intended to be called from application code.
trans-unit.target: Este método não se destina a ser chamado a partir do código da aplicação.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <xref href="System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa a <xref href="System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: This method is not intended to be called from application code.
trans-unit.target: Este método não se destina a ser chamado a partir do código da aplicação.

trans-unit.source: The Init method ensures that the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> is included in the processing of the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> and <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.EndRequest> events.
trans-unit.target: O método Init assegura que o <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>está incluído no processamento do <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest>e <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.EndRequest>eventos.</xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.EndRequest> </xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> </xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: The current <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplication"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Atual <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplication"> </xref> instância.
